alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 3:41AM EST until December 16 at 10:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Snowfall accumulations will range from 1 to 3 inches across the eastern half of the county and 3 to 8 inches across the western half of the county. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Orange County. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A warning level snowfall (more than 6 inches) will be possible across far western sections of Orange county, mainly north and west of the I-84 corridor from Port Jervis to Montgomery.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
